title: The Conspiracy "Myth", Charles Eisenstein
description:
The world is rife with conspiracy theory, why, and what does it say about this moment in history?

In this conversation with Rebel Wisdom's David Fuller, Charles Eisenstein outlines why he thinks conspiracy theory is best understood mythologically.

Charles's article 'The Conspiracy Myth' is here: https://charleseisenstein.org/essays/the-conspiracy-myth/?fbclid=IwAR0Ft1eRLuRtewqW0craGswR8H0dFaKAZDoKoh54XNmkqK6w-BV7HSRfvek

The article referred to by David Fuller, Cashing in on Covid, is here: https://medium.com/rebel-wisdom/cashing-in-on-covid-london-real-david-icke-c4cac9f897dc

Charles's previous film with Rebel Wisdom, An Epidemic of Control, is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NK8C_rCz1yw&t=2115s

You can listen to podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com


You can also become a Rebel Wisdom member, for many benefits including our regular Q&As with the interviewees from our films, check out: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
